faqs.a: Zomato is a technology platform that connects customers, restaurant partners, and delivery partners, offering food delivery, dining-out discovery, and restaurant reviews.
It is used by hungry customers looking to order food or find restaurants, and by restaurant owners looking to list their business and manage online orders.
The app is free to use. Customers pay the cost of food, a delivery fee (variable based on distance), and platform fees. Restaurants pay a commission on orders.
Key features include online ordering with live tracking, table reservations, restaurant photos and reviews, and 'Zomato Legends' for intercity delivery.

faqs.q: What are the benefits for users?
faqs.a: Users enjoy the convenience of doorstep delivery, access to thousands of restaurant menus, discounts on dining, and the ability to discover new food spots via community reviews.

faqs.q: Is there a premium membership available?
faqs.a: Yes, 'Zomato Gold' is a subscription service that offers benefits like free delivery on eligible orders and special discounts on dining out.
